current_timestamp.description: Current timestamp at the time of the data retrieval

average_call_duration.description: Average duration of calls in seconds

average_queue_wait_time.description: Average time callers spend waiting in the queue in seconds

average_wrap_up_time.description: Average time taken by agents to complete call-related work after the call ends in seconds

max_calls_waiting.description: Maximum number of calls waiting in the queue at a given time

max_queue_wait_time.description: Longest wait time experienced by a caller in the queue in seconds

total_call_duration.description: Total duration of all calls combined in seconds

total_wrap_up_time.description: Total time taken by agents for after-call tasks across all calls in seconds

average_callback_wait_time.description: Average wait time before callback in seconds

average_hold_time.description: Average time callers are put on hold in seconds

average_time_to_answer.description: Average time taken to answer calls in seconds

total_calls_abandoned_in_queue.description: Total calls abandoned by callers while waiting in the queue

total_calls_outside_business_hours.description: Total calls received outside normal business hours

total_calls_with_exceeded_queue_wait_tim.description: Total calls where wait time exceeded a defined threshold

total_calls_with_requested_voicemail.description: Total calls where callers requested a voicemail

total_hold_time.description: Total time callers were put on hold across all calls in seconds

total_embeddable_callback_calls.description: Total number of calls that were callbacks from an embedded service
